alert.note: Alert for Star Valley (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 09 at 1:32PM MST until January 10 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Total accumulations of 3 to 5 inches. Southwest wind occasionally gusting 10 to 20 mph. * WHERE...Star Valley. * WHEN...From 2 PM MST Monday to 11 AM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Expect winter travel conditions. The wintry conditions could impact commuter travel, especially Tuesday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Slightly higher totals are possible along the eastern foothills around Star Valley Ranch. The heaviest snow is likely to fall between 6 PM Monday and 6 AM Tuesday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
